title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories on the x axis representing Brand, and Share of shipments in each Brand on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Lenovo where Share of shipments is 24.1.
The lowest category is found at Asus where Share of shipments is 5.5.
The highest value at Lenovo is almost 4.38 times larger than the minimum value of Asus.
The highest value at Lenovo is almost 4.38 times larger than the minimum value of Asus.
The difference between the max Brand Lenovo and min Brand Asus is 18.6.
